PluginData.Author: StarCpt
PluginData.Tooltip: Adds useful features to the respawn screen
PluginData.Description: NEW - Chat is now usable from the respawn screen! Features: - Adds a search box for spawn names - Adds the ability to sort list by spawn name or owner in ascending or descending order - Replaces the "Ready" text with owner name (Ready status is still viewable in the tooltip) - Shows full spawn name in the tooltip - Dropdown menu to filter by owner
